mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (uname, schoolname, gradeclass, uid, upw, route, boardingplace, joindate, coupon) VALUES (#{uname}, #{schoolname}, #{gradeclass}, #{uid}, sha1(#{upw}), #{route}, #{boardingplace}, now(), #{coupon})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET uname = #{uname}, schoolname = #{schoolname}, gradeclass = #{gradeclass}, uid = #{uid}, upw = sha1(#{upw}), route = #{route}, boardingplace = #{boardingplace}, joindate = now(), coupon = #{coupon} WHERE num = #{num}
